channel.title: Family on Sky Travel Blogger
channel.description: Recent content in Family on Sky Travel Blogger

item.title: Weekend Getaway – Chattanooga, TN
item.description: Sometimes it’s the last-minute trips that are so much fun. Fortunately living in Atlanta, Georgia is the perfect distance away from so many nearby states. A holiday weekend approached and deciding what we should do was a small dilemma because we only had 1 night, we could spend away due to a family event that we had committed too.
